wikitext.*:
'''The Lord of the Rings''' can refer to: 
==Middle-earth==
* '''The [[Lord of the Ring]], [[Sauron]].'''

==Books==
* '''''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', the [[1954]]-[[1955|5]] book by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].'''
**[[The Lord of the Rings (50th Anniversary Edition)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (50th Anniversary Edition)]], the main scholarly reference.

==Adaptations==
===Films===
* [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1978 film)]], an animated film by [[Ralph Bakshi]].
** [[The Lord Of The Rings (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)|''The Lord Of The Rings'' (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]], the soundtrack.
* '''[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]], directed by [[Peter Jackson]]''':
** ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', the [[2001]] film.
** ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'', the [[2002]] film.
** ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'', the [[2003]] film.
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim]]'', an upcoming anime film.

===Television series===
* ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'', a television series by [[Amazon Studios]].

===Radio series===
* [[The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1955 radio series)]], a six-part series for the [[BBC]].
* [[The Lord of the Rings (1979 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1979 radio series)]], an American production by The Mind's Eye.
* '''[[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]], a 26-part dramatisation by the [[BBC]].'''

===Stage adaptations===
* ''[[The Lord of the Rings (musical)]]'', the stage show which has had runs in Toronto, London and Newbury.

===Video games===
*[[J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings, Vol. I (1990 video game)|''J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings, Vol. I'' (1990 video game)]], a [[1990]] video-game for the PC.
*''[[J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings, Vol. II: The Two Towers]]'', a [[1992]] video-game for the PC.
*[[J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings, Vol. I (SNES)|''J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings, Vol. I'' (SNES)]], a [[1994]] video-game for the SNES.
*[[Lord of the Rings: The Duel (video game)|''Lord of the Rings: The Duel'' (video game)]], the [[1997]] video game.
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)]]'', the [[2002]] video game.
*[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (video game)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (video game)]], the [[2002]] video game based on [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers|the film]].
*[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (video game)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (video game)]], the [[2003]] video game based on [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King|the film]].
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring]]'', the [[2003]] video game.
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age]]'', the [[2004]] video game.
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth]]'', the [[2004]] video game for the PC.
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: Tactics]]'', the [[2005]] video game.
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'', the [[2006]] video game for the PC and Xbox.
**''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II: The Rise of the Witch-king]]'', a [[2006]] expansion pack.
*''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'', first released to the public in [[2007]].
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: Conquest]]'', the [[2009]] video game.
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest]]'', the [[2010]] video game.
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]'', the [[2011]] video game.
*''[[Lego The Lord of the Rings: The Video Game]]'', a [[Lego]] [[2012]] video game based on [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)]].
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: Heroes of Middle-earth]]'', the [[2023]] video game.

===Other games===
* ''[[The Lord of the Rings Tarot]]'', a [[1997]] card deck and game.
* ''[[The Lord of the Rings Roleplaying Game]]'', a [[2002]] game by [[Decipher]].
* ''[[The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game]]'', sets of collectible trading cards, also by [[Decipher]].
* ''[[Lord of the Rings (board game)]]'', a [[2000]] board game with artwork by [[John Howe]].
* ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien's Lord of the Rings]]'', a [[2003]] children's board game.
* ''[[Lord of the Rings Trivia Game]]'', a [[2003]] board game.
* ''[[Monopoly: The Lord of the Rings Trilogy Edition]]'', a special version of [[wikipedia:Monopoly (game)|Monopoly]].

===Music===
* "[[The Lord of the Rings (song)|The Lord of the Rings]]", a song by [[Blind Guardian]].

===Miscellanous===
*''[[The Lord of the Rings (Super Cinema Card)]]'', a c. 1993-4 film card.
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: A Book of 20 Postcards]]'' (2000).
